word_group.brief_definition: 稍微的变化；微小的变化

bilingual.source: The heat caused the metal to distend slightly.

bilingual.target: 他喜欢稍微烧焦的棉花糖。

bilingual.source: His teeth protrude slightly when he smiles.
bilingual.target: 他笑的时候牙齿会稍微突出。

bilingual.source: The nail protrudes slightly from the wooden board.
bilingual.target: 钉子从木板上稍微突出出来。

bilingual.source: Make sure the tiles overlap slightly to prevent leaks.
bilingual.target: 确保瓷砖稍微重叠以防止漏水。

bilingual.source: The two circles overlapped slightly on the diagram.
bilingual.target: 图上的两个圆圈稍微重叠了一点。

bilingual.source: She coughed up some sputum and felt slightly better.
bilingual.target: 她咳出了一些痰，感觉稍微好了一些。

bilingual.source: The wind was strong enough to bend the flagpole slightly.
bilingual.target: 风力足够强大，能把旗杆稍微吹弯。

bilingual.source: Her teeth were slightly protruding, giving her a unique smile.
bilingual.target: 她的牙齿稍微有些突出的，使她的笑容很独特。

bilingual.source: Tilt the camera slightly to the left for a better angle.
bilingual.target: 将相机稍微倾斜向左，以获得更好的角度。

yingyinNormal.en: And all we want to do is just cook this for just a few seconds, just to slightly wilt down the spinach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我们只需要稍微翻炒一下，让菠菜叶变得软嫩。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Here it is. I can control the thermostat in Leonard's apartment with my phone. And when he makes me mad, I turn it up, slightly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧。告诉你。我可以通过手机操控莱纳德公寓的恒温器。当他惹我生气时，我就把温度稍微上调几度。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, the pull of gravity is stronger the closer you are to the sun, so you'd think that if the earth got bumped slightly towards the sun (like, if you jumped, or something), then the sun would pull just a little bit stronger, tugging the earth yet closer still, at which point the sun's pull would be stronger yet again, and the earth would spiral in to its eventual doom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的意思是，地心引力的拉力随着物体与之距离愈近而增强，所以你可能会觉得如果地球稍微离太阳靠近一些些（像是你跳起来，离天花板就比站立时近一些，之类的），然后太阳对地球的拉力就会增加一点点，将地球往太阳拉近一些，然后，随着距离拉近一些，太阳对地球的拉力又再次微幅增加，直到地球会以螺旋轨迹方式，最终撞上太阳，而毁灭。e

yingyinNormal.en: This is a slightly different technique.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一个小技巧。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm just going to place the sea bass here. Just let that plate cool slightly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我先把海鲈鱼放在这里，把盘子稍稍放凉。

yingyinNormal.en: Now slightly off track, but over here in the distance, a nod to our Russian neighbors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在稍偏一点的地方，在远处那边是代表邻国俄罗斯的景点。

yingyinNormal.en: You know this guy? Yeah, he looks slightly familiar. Get off the bloody chandelier, Hank!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你认识这家伙？是啊，他看起来有点眼熟，从那该死的吊灯上下来，汉克。

yingyinNormal.en: Keep your broom steady, hover for a moment then lean forward slightly and touch back down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 得把那扫帚扶稳了，先盘旋一会，然后身子稍稍往前倾斜回到地面。

yingyinNormal.en: For a slightly wilder experience explore the jungle paths of the Bukit Timah Nature Reserve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想要更刺激的体验？那便要来到武吉知马自然保护区，在森林小径探险。

yingyinNormal.en: I think you slightly gave away the ending. There were five main suspects. One of them called Blessington.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得你好像把答案说漏嘴了。一共五个嫌疑人。其中一个叫布莱辛顿。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, just keep in mind that should you ever need a slightly apathetic tertiary friend, I stand at the ready.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你只要记得只要你需要一位略显冷淡的第三好的朋友，我时刻准备着。

yingyinNormal.en: Because as you approached it, you wouldn't be pulled enough and would merely pass by with your path slightly bent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为，当地球靠近太阳时，将没有足够的引力将地球拉回，而就只是沿着切线方向离去。

yingyinNormal.en: Jill would have seen him move slightly further down the track, resulting in her seeing the ball follow a triangular path.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吉尔会看到杰克和火车一起向前移动，结果她看到的球是以三角形的路线移动的。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's say we're adjusting our all options. Do we maybe wanna consider a slightly less gruesome alternatives? Are you coming?
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我们得好好想想，何必把他留下来喂狼呢？你走不走？

yingyinNormal.en: I learned that while most everyone expects the future to be a slightly modified version of the present, it is typically very different.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也明白了虽然每个人觉得未来只是稍有不同的现在版本，但事实是非常不同的。

yingyinNormal.en: But it's not like you're going to float off the planet if you get too close to the Antarctic Peninsula, though you might weigh slightly less.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不表示一靠近南极，你就会地从表浮起来 但你的体重会稍稍下降。

yingyinNormal.en: And the loss of ice means the area is becoming less dense, and that means that the pull of gravity is slightly less strong in the region than it once was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 融冰让这区域不再那么紧密，也表示了引力跟之前相比也削弱了许多。

yingyinNormal.en: The details are a bit subtle, but if gravity were just slightly steeper, as it would be if we lived in four spatial dimensions, you could never orbit the sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这其中的细节有些隐晦，但是如果重力比现在更强，就会好像我们处在四维度空间中一般，永远无法以绕着太阳方式的轨道运行。

yingyinNormal.en: Which makes it slightly perplexing that you managed to miss our sign on the way in. This is a private property my friend, I'm gonna ask him to ask you to leave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你进来的路上，是不是没有看到路上的标识，这是私人地方，我的朋友，我想请他叫你离开这。

yingyinNormal.en: According to a 1991 study, couples who went to bed and woke up at different times, tended to argue more, spent less time together in shared activities, and had slightly less sex.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1991年的研究发现，有不同睡觉时间的情侣，比较容易争吵，花比较少时间相处，也较少亲热的时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 稍微地；些许地；纤弱地；瘦小地

word_family.mean: adj. 少量的；轻微的；纤弱的；瘦小的；不结实的；不深奥的；无实质内容的；不重要的；肤浅的

examination_example.sentence: It may be a well-informed, well-researched opinion, but it's still an opinion, so talk tentatively and <highlight>slightly</highlight> understate your confidence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能是一个见多识广、研究充分的观点，但它仍然只是一个观点。因此要试探性的讨论并且稍微低估自己的信心。

examination_example.sentence: The Sarbanes-Oxley Act has pushed most public companies to defer performance bonuses for senior executives by a year, <highlight>slightly</highlight> helping reduce "short-termism."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 萨班斯-奥克斯利法案(Sarbanes-Oxley Act)促使大多数上市公司将高管的绩效奖金推迟一年，这在一定程度上有助于减少“短期主义”。

examination_example.sentence: The use of privacy law to curb the tech giants in this instance feels <highlight>slightly</highlight> maladapted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这种情况下，使用隐私法来遏制科技巨头感觉有点不适合。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Children not as liked by their first-grade peers had <highlight>slightly</highlight> lower grades in fifth grade, while those with higher social acceptance had higher grades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不被一年级同龄人喜欢的孩子，五年级的时候，成绩会略低，而社会认可度较高的孩子则成绩较高。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 少量的；轻微的；纤弱的；瘦小的；不结实的；不深奥的；无实质内容的；不重要的；肤浅的

examination_example.sentence: Overnight, Chicago reached a low of 21 degrees F Fahrenheit below zero, making it <highlight>slightly</highlight> colder than Antarctica (南极洲) , Alaska, and the North Pole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一夜之间，芝加哥达到零下21华氏度，比南极洲、阿拉斯加和北极的温度还要低一些。

examination_example.sentence: Adults ages 18 to 34 were <highlight>slightly</highlight> more likely to be living in their parents'home than they were to be living with a spouse or partner in their own household.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 18岁到34岁的成年人“住在父母家的可能性”首次略超“和配偶或伴侣住在自己家的可能性”。

examination_example.sentence: Older people and women made the mistake <highlight>slightly</highlight> more often, but that may be because grandparents have more grandchildren to mix up than parents have children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老年人和女性叫错名字的频率略高，但这可能是因为祖父母比父母有更多的孙辈混淆。

examination_example.sentence: Carpets, for instance, seem to be <highlight>slightly</highlight> better places to drop your food than wood or tile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，地毯似乎比木头或瓷砖更适合放食物。
